SoftwareType.Name: MMO
SoftwareType.Description: Massively Multiplayer Online Game, do I need to say more?

Feature.Name: Tutorial
Feature.Description: The full on in game tutorial... its very helpful!

Feature.Name: InGame Audio Chat
Feature.Description: For times when you are bored, and you need someone to talk to, use the InGame Audio Chat, where you can speak and converse with other members of the game.

Feature.Name: InGame Text Chat
Feature.Description: For times when your are bored, and you need someone to text, use the InGame Audio Chat, where you can text and converse with other member of the game.

Feature.Name: Lobby
Feature.Description: For the InGame chats, you get to be in different servers, also called lobbys'.

Feature.Name: VIP
Feature.Description: Get VIP for the MMO, so you can get more credits, and more stuff!

Feature.Name: DLC's
Feature.Description: All new DLC's where you can unlock new places!
